title: Josh Allen Expectations, Jaguars pick not locked in, Panthers QB Questions, Draft risks
itunes:title: Josh Allen Expectations, Jaguars pick not locked in, Panthers QB Questions, Draft risks
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with expectations for Josh Allen this season. Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara question when it's Super Bowl or bust in Buffalo.  Peter helps us look at Draft questions that are still being pondered by teams, including who the Jaguars will take with #1.  The table questions what path the Panthers will take at QB because Kyle doesn't really like any of the options. We look at which NFL teams should be taking the biggest swings during the Draft before previewing Peter's 2.0 mock draft coming on Tuesday.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
